snippet: Former President Jimmy Carter underwent surgery Monday to remove a small mass in his liver and is expected to fully recover, according to a spokeswoman.
abstract: Former Pres Jimmy Carter undergoes surgery to remove mass in his liver; procedure was elective, and Carter is expected to fully recover.
lead_paragraph: Former President Jimmy Carter underwent surgery Monday to remove a small mass in his liver and is expected to fully recover, according to a spokeswoman.

headline.main: Georgia: Jimmy Carter Has Surgery on Liver
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Jimmy Carter Has Surgery on Liver
